Title: Hooray! Todd Episode!
Writer: Raphael Bob-Waksberg (created by), Elijah Aron, Jordan Young
Actors: Will Arnett, Amy Sedaris, Alison Brie, Paul F. Tompkins
Plot: Helpful to a fault, Todd is spread thin doing favors for Princess Carolyn, Mr. Peanutbutter and a visitor with a potential connection to BoJack.
